name: Reorder qty report
query:
select 
sl.item_code as "Item code:Link/Item:120",
i.item_name as "Item Name::400",
i.stock_uom as "Stock UOM::100",
IFNULL((select ir.warehouse_reorder_qty from `tabItem Reorder` ir join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli on sli.item_code = ir.parent where sli.item_code = sl.item_code  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Reorder qty::100",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Balanace Stock::100",
IFNULL((select sum(poi.qty-poi.received_qty)  from `tabPurchase Order Item` poi join `tabPurchase Order` po on poi.parent=po.name  where poi.item_code=sl.item_code and po.status="To Receive and Bill"),0) as "PO::100",
IFNULL((select ir.warehouse_reorder_qty from `tabItem Reorder` ir join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli on sli.item_code = ir.parent where sli.item_code = sl.item_code  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)- IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)- IFNULL((select sum(poi.qty-poi.received_qty)  from `tabPurchase Order Item` poi join `tabPurchase Order` po on poi.parent=po.name  where poi.item_code=sl.item_code and po.status="To Receive and Bill"),0) as "Order Qty::100",
case when (IFNULL((select ir.warehouse_reorder_qty from `tabItem Reorder` ir join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli on sli.item_code = ir.parent where sli.item_code = sl.item_code  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)- IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)- IFNULL((select sum(poi.qty-poi.received_qty)  from `tabPurchase Order Item` poi join `tabPurchase Order` po on poi.parent=po.name  where poi.item_code=sl.item_code and po.status="To Receive and Bill"),0)) <= 0 then "No need to order"  Else "need to order" end as "Reorder Status::150"
from `tabItem` i join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sl where sl.item_code=i.item_code and IFNULL((select ir.warehouse_reorder_qty from `tabItem Reorder` ir join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli on sli.item_code = ir.parent where sli.item_code = sl.item_code  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) > 0 group by sl.item_code;
